info.description: Data API, database migration scripts, and backend services for all Podverse models.
info.title: Podverse API

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3

post.summary: Get the currently logged-in user's info
post.description: Returns an object with the currently logged-in user's info

Returns user information in the response body. If query param includeBodyToken=true is provided, then it will return the bearer token in the response body, else it will set the bearer token as an HTTPOnly cookie named "Authorization".
Reset a user's password if the correct token is provided

404.description: User not found or invalid token

post.summary: Send email to reset user's password
post.description: Sends email to user that directs the user to the password reset page, along with a resetPasswordToken

post.summary: Send email to verify a user's email address
post.description: Send email to verify a user's email address

Creates a new user, sends a verification email, and returns user information in the response body. If query param includeBodyToken=true is provided, then it will return the bearer token in the response body, else it will set the bearer token as an HTTPOnly cookie named "Authorization".

get.description: Verification is successful if a valid emailVerificationToken is included in the request

404.description: User not found or invalid verification token

post.description: Returns a new bitpayInvoice object (disabled because of unresolved issues with automating the BitPay private key pairing process during deploys)

get.summary: Get the status of a bitpayInvoice by ID (disabled)
get.description: Returns the status of a bitpayInvoice by ID (disabled because of unresolved issues with automating the BitPay private key pairing process during deploys)

post.summary: Handle webhook notifications to update a BitPayInvoice object
post.description: When a request is made to this endpoint, it takes the invoiceID from the request and makes a request to BitPay to get the latest status for invoice with that id. If the invoice returned from BitPay was updated more recently than the version stored locally, then the local version is updated. Always returns status 200 so that BitPay stops sending the notification.

get.description: Returns an array of episodes. Set includePodcast = true if you want the podcast included in the response. Pass a string to searchAllFieldsText to filter based on episode title.

Returns an array of mediaRefs. Pass a string to searchAllFieldsText to filter based on clip, episode, or podcast title. Set includeEpisode to true if you want episode data returned, or includePodcast to true if you want episode and podcast data returned.
Returns a logged-in user's paypalOrder object

post.summary: Handle webhook notifications to update a PayPalOrder object
post.description: When an request is made to this endpoint, it then takes the request body and passes it into a request to PayPal to verify the order is valid. If it is, then locally we check if the notification is newer than the last updated date of the paypalOrder, and if that is true the paypalOrder is updated with the latest status. Always returns status 200 so that PayPal stops sending the notification (I haven't confirmed if that's needed actually). Check the PayPal Webhooks Simulator for the response data structure.

patch.summary: Add or remove mediaRef or episode to playlist
patch.description: Adds or removes mediaRef or episode to playlist

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of playlist to toggle subscribe

get.description: Returns an array of podcasts. Set includeAuthors or includeCategories to true if needed.

get.summary: Find the latest metadata for a list of podcasts
get.description: Accepts a list of podcast ids and returns an array of only the latest metadata for those podcasts.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of podcast to toggle subscribe

get.description: Returns an array of public user objects. Must provide a userIds query param or it will return an empty array.

get.summary: Get the currently logged-in user's mediaRefs
get.description: Returns an array of the currently logged-in user's mediaRefs

get.summary: Get the currently logged-in user's playlists
get.description: Returns an array of the currently logged-in user's playlists
Returns an array of the public user's mediaRefs. If user not found, returns an empty array.
Returns an array of the public user's playlists. If user not found, returns an empty array.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of user to toggle subscribe

patch.summary: Update a logged-in user's history item playback position
Add or update a logged-in user's history item

delete.summary: Remove episode or mediaRef from logged-in user's history items.
delete.description: Must provide an episodeId or mediaRefId.

delete.summary: Removes all of a logged-in user's history items.
delete.description: Removes all of a logged-in user's history items.

get.summary: Get the logged-in user's full user profile
get.description: Returns the logged-in user's full user profile.

patch.description: Returns an array of the logged-in user's queueItems
